articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from day three of the fifth Ashes Test between England and Australia at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Ashes build-up: England prepare for one-innings shootout with Australia

articles.description: England midfielder Keira Walsh did not suffer an anterior cruciate ligament injury against Denmark in the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: England midfielder Walsh has not suffered ACL injury

articles.description: Watch and follow text updates as France face Brazil at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up to France v Brazil

articles.description: Max Verstappen pips McLaren's Oscar Piastri to pole position for the Belgian Grand Prix sprint race by just 0.011 seconds.
articles.title: Verstappen edges out Piastri for Belgium sprint pole

articles.description: Captain Wendie Renard scores a late headed winner as France beat Brazil in a thrilling Group F game in Brisbane at the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Renard heads late winner as France beat Brazil

articles.description: French winger Allan Saint-Maximin confirms he is leaving Newcastle United, saying his "greatest trophy" was playing for the club.
articles.title: Saint-Maximin confirms Newcastle departure

articles.description: Australia pick up their first wicket of the innings as Mitchell Starc removes Ben Duckett on 42 after a review.
articles.title: England lose first wicket as Duckett falls on 42

articles.description: The Saudi Pro League's financial clout has "changed the market" for transfers and elite clubs "need to be aware of what is happening", says Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola.
articles.title: Saudi league has changed the market - Guardiola

articles.description: Manchester United reject a £20m bid from West Ham for their England defender Harry Maguire.
articles.title: Man Utd reject £20m West Ham bid for Maguire

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio Manchester commentary of Wigan Warriors v Leigh Leopards in the Super League.
articles.title: Listen: Super League - Wigan Warriors v Leigh Leopards
